headline: Should FIS's Expansion of Cloud-Based Auto Finance Capabilities Reshape Its Recurring Revenue Outlook?
summary: Earlier this week, FIS announced a significant enhancement to its Asset Finance SaaS solution, expanding support for US consumer auto finance and integrating end-to-end functionality across loans and leases for auto, wholesale, and equipment finance on a cloud-native platform. This development is expected to streamline lender operations and modernize lending infrastructure, enhancing scalability, compliance, and user experience for both financial institutions and borrowers. We'll examine how...
